trans-unit.source: Specifies the theme class an activity designer uses on the workflow design surface.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Theme classes specify a set of properties that determine the appearance of an activity when it is placed on a workflow design surface.
Activity-designer developers can associate a theme class to a designer by declaring a Theme attribute for the designer.
The ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute class defines the declarative Theme attribute, including the argument that must be passed in the attribute, and all of its properties.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute"></xref> class by using the specified designer theme type.
A <xref:System.Type> that represents the designer theme to be associated with the designer class.
Gets the type of the theme class that encapsulates the designer theme settings to apply to the activity designer.
A <xref:System.Type> that encapsulates the designer theme settings.
Gets or sets an XML string that defines default property settings for the activity designer.
An activity designer can pass an XML string that contains any of its default theme property values to the Xml property by declaring the property in the Theme attribute.
A string that contains the default theme property settings in XML format.
